data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during MIÑO cruise from Puerto Rico to Veracruz started at 1794-02-19
Ship: Miño (Navío), Voyage: Puerto Rico - Veracruz, 1st Observer: Juan de Mendoza y Urtado (Capitán)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
